long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blackfy: The Ultimate Pure Black Dark Mode Extension for Chrome

Experience a whole new level of browsing comfort and style with extension, the premium pure black dark mode extension for Chrome. Whether you're working late, binge-watching videos, or catching up on social media like Facebook, YouTube, Twitter Instagram, and TikTok, Blackfy delivers a sleek, eye-soothing pure black theme that enhances every aspect of your online experience.

Key Features:
Pure Black Dark Mode for Chrome: Transform your Chrome browser with a visually stunning pure black theme for a professional, modern look.
Pure Black for All Websites: Apply a rich, pure black dark mode to every website, including Google and your favorite platforms, for a seamless experience.
One-Button Exception List: Need certain websites to stay in light mode? Our plugin makes it effortless to exclude specific websites from the dark theme with just one click, giving you full control.
Eye Protection: Reduce eye strain with an optimized pure black design perfect for low-light browsing, especially during late hours.
Social Media Compatibility: Enjoy flawless pure black dark mode across social media platforms like Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok.
Customizable and Lightweight: Adjust Blackfy’s settings to suit your preferences while keeping your browser fast and efficient.
Why Choose ?
True Pure Black Theme: Unlike other extensions,  offers a pure black mode that is not only visually appealing but also helps save battery life on OLED screens.
Exception List Control: With Blackfy’s exclusive one-button feature, you can easily toggle specific websites to remain in their original light mode.
Enhanced Comfort: Protect your eyes and enjoy a stress-free browsing experience with a theme designed for long hours of use.
Consistent Performance: From Google to social media, Blackfy ensures smooth and consistent performance across all websites.
How to Use :
Download and install  from the Chrome Web Store.
Activate pure black dark mode on Chrome with a single click.
Use the exception list button to exclude specific websites from the dark theme.
Explore a visually appealing and comfortable browsing experience tailored to your needs.
You’re not just enabling dark mode—you’re upgrading to a pure black dark mode that’s stylish, functional, and fully customizable. Whether you're protecting your eyes, saving battery life, or just loving the sleek aesthetics, Blackfy delivers the ultimate browsing enhancement.

Transform your browsing with Blackfy today—install now and experience the power of pure black!
